title: bill wurtz

fields.name: Notifications (host please use):
fields.value:
"looks like it's time to play some *smooth jazz*"
"no jazz tonight. it's sad. it makes me sad."
"thanks for checking in i'm still a piece of garbage."
"uh oh. it looks like nobody visited you last night. you will kill two random people because that's just what you do."
**You were clobbered by bill wurtz! You have died!"**
[x] - clobbered by bill wurtz

desc:
Post 320
*hi. you're on a rock floating in space.*

- Your first post of each day must contain a quote from the video "history of the entire world, i guess" by bill wurtz.
- Each night, you may play jazz msuci. Every player that visits you will become a fan. If nobody visits you, you will randomly auto-kill 2 players.
